Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2009 07:50AM lpizza726 wrote: I am glad I found this website. I was just diagonesd on the 2nd and just found the lump 1 week ago  I am 41 and had an annual mamo & ultrasound  in Jan and everything was negative!  No family history and I feel great. Already going for surgery on Friday for a masectomy. Everything is moving so fast that is heard to believe.  Lots of prayers and positive attitude and we will conquer this beast of a diease.
Posts.Title: Everything is happening so fast fiona1144 lpizza726
